reuters.title: NEBRASKA FEEDLOT CATTLE UP 0.50/1.00 DLR - USDA
reuters.body:
slaughter cattle prices rose 0.50 to 1.00 dlr amid good buyer demand and fairly good seller interest, the usda said. steers - mostly choice 2-4 1100-1350 lbs 68.00-69.00 fob and delivered. heifers - mostly choice 2-4 975-1150 lbs 66.00-67.00 fob and delivered.
Reuter 
